languages.text: "Но как ты... ведь лифт..! Проклятье, зачем весь этот сумбур?! Почему ты не мог{rt_mf||ла} просто дождаться завершения ритуала в клетке и не мешать?" {n}Скоморох озирается на алтарь.{/n} "Тавриск, пошевеливайся!"

"But how did you... the elevator! Damn it, why did you have to make all this commotion? Why couldn't you just sit in a cage, out of the way, and wait for the ritual to be completed?" {n}The fool looks back at the altar.{/n} "Tavrisk, move!"
languages.original_text: "Но как ты... ведь лифт..! Проклятье, зачем весь этот сумбур?! Почему ты не мог{rt_mf||ла} просто дождаться завершения ритуала в клетке и не мешать?" {n}Скоморох озирается на алтарь.{/n} "Тавриск, пошевеливайся!"

traits.locale_text: "But how did you... the elevator! Damn it, why did you have to make all this commotion? Why couldn't you just wait for the cage ritual to be completed and stay out of the way?" {n}The fool looks back at the altar.{/n} "Tavrisk, move!"

"Stop bawling, you silly girl! It will be over soon. Our sweet Tavrisk will finish his preparations and we'll try again. You will be closer to your beloved brother than you ever dared to dream! And then I will punish you for the foolish prank you have pulled, tee hee..." {n}Glaito's claws strike out a spark against the floor, the jester's cap twitches and Ruoldo turns to you.{/n}

"But how did you... the elevator! Damn it, why did you have to make all this commotion? Why couldn't you just wait for the cage ritual to be completed and stay out of the way?" {n}The fool looks back at the altar.{/n} "Tavrisk, move!"

"Stop bawling, you silly girl! It will all be over soon. Our sweet Tavrisk here will finish his preparations, and we'll simply try again. You will be closer to your beloved brother than you ever dared to dream! And then, I will punish you for this foolish little prank you've pulled, tee hee..." {n}Glaito's claws strike out a spark against the floor. The fool's cap twitches as Ruoldo turns to you.{/n}

"But how did you... the elevator! Damn it, why did you have to make all this commotion? Why couldn't you just sit in a cage, out of the way, and wait for the ritual to be completed?" {n}The fool looks back at the altar.{/n} "Tavrisk, move!"

"But how did you... the elevator! Damn it, why did you have to make all this commotion? Why couldn't you just sit in a cage, out of the way, and wait for the ritual to be completed?" {n}The fool looks back at the altar.{/n} "Tavrisk, move!"

"But how did you... the elevator! Damn it, why did you have to make all this commotion? Why couldn't you just wait for the cage ritual to be completed and stay out of the way?" {n}The fool looks back at the altar.{/n} "Tavrisk, move!"

languages.text: “可你到底是……那个电梯！真该死，你干嘛非要惹出这么大麻烦不可？你就不能呆在笼子里，别捣乱，老老实实等着仪式完成吗？”{n}小丑回过头，看着祭坛。{/n}“塔夫瑞克，快点！”
languages.original_text: "But how did you... the elevator! Damn it, why did you have to make all this commotion? Why couldn't you just sit in a cage, out of the way, and wait for the ritual to be completed?" {n}The fool looks back at the altar.{/n} "Tavrisk, move!"

traits.locale_text: “可你到底是……那个电梯！真该死，你干嘛非要惹出这么大麻烦不可？你就不能呆在笼子里，别捣乱，老老实实等着仪式完成吗？”{n}小丑回过头，看着祭坛。{/n}“塔夫瑞克，快点！”
“可你到底是……那个电梯！真该死，你干嘛非要惹出这么大麻烦不可？你就不能给我老实点，安安静静等待囚笼仪式完成吗？”{n}小丑回过头，看着祭坛。{/n}“塔夫瑞克，快点！”

languages.text: 「でも、どうやって…エレベーターか！くそっ、なぜこんなに騒ぎを大きくしたんだ？おとなしく檻の中でじっとして、儀式が終わるのを待っていればいいものを！」{n}道化は祭壇のほうを振り返った。{/n}「タヴリスク、動け！」
languages.original_text: "But how did you... the elevator! Damn it, why did you have to make all this commotion? Why couldn't you just sit in a cage, out of the way, and wait for the ritual to be completed?" {n}The fool looks back at the altar.{/n} "Tavrisk, move!"

traits.locale_text: 「でも、どうやって…エレベーターか！くそっ、なぜこんなに騒ぎを大きくしたんだ？おとなしく檻の中でじっとして、儀式が終わるのを待っていればいいものを！」{n}道化は祭壇のほうを振り返った。{/n}「タヴリスク、動け！」

languages.text: «¿Pero cómo ha...? ¡El ascensor! Maldita sea, ¿por qué ha tenido que armar tanto revuelo? ¿No podía estarse {rt_mf|quietecito|quietecita} en su jaula hasta que completase el ritual?». {n}El bufón vuelve la mirada hacia el altar.{/n} «¡Espabila, Tavrisk!».
languages.original_text: "But how did you... the elevator! Damn it, why did you have to make all this commotion? Why couldn't you just sit in a cage, out of the way, and wait for the ritual to be completed?" {n}The fool looks back at the altar.{/n} "Tavrisk, move!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Pero cómo ha...? ¡El ascensor! Maldita sea, ¿por qué ha tenido que armar tanto revuelo? ¿No podía estarse {mf|quietecito|quietecita} en su jaula hasta que completase el ritual?». {n}El bufón vuelve la mirada hacia el altar.{/n} «¡Espabila, Tavrisk!».

languages.text: "Ama nasıl... Asansör! Kahretsin, velvele çıkarmasan olmazdı ya! Neden uslu uslu kafesinde oturup kimseye bulaşmadan ayinin tamamlanmasını bekleyemedin ki?" {n}Soytarı sunağa dönüyor.{/n} "Tavrisk, kımılda!"
languages.original_text: "But how did you... the elevator! Damn it, why did you have to make all this commotion? Why couldn't you just sit in a cage, out of the way, and wait for the ritual to be completed?" {n}The fool looks back at the altar.{/n} "Tavrisk, move!"

traits.locale_text: "Ama nasıl... Asansör! Kahretsin, velvele çıkarmasan olmazdı ya! Neden uslu uslu kafesinde oturup kimseye bulaşmadan ayinin tamamlanmasını bekleyemedin ki?" {n}Soytarı sunağa dönüyor.{/n} "Tavrisk, kımılda!"

languages.text: « Mais comment avez-vous... l'ascenseur ! Bon sang, vous ne pouviez pas faire moins de fracas ? C'était trop compliqué d'attendre à l'abri dans une cage que le rituel soit terminé ? » {n}Le bouffon lance un regard en arrière vers l'autel.{/n} « Tavrisk, ne restez pas là ! »
languages.original_text: "But how did you... the elevator! Damn it, why did you have to make all this commotion? Why couldn't you just sit in a cage, out of the way, and wait for the ritual to be completed?" {n}The fool looks back at the altar.{/n} "Tavrisk, move!"

traits.locale_text: « Mais comment avez-vous... l'ascenseur ! Bon sang, vous ne pouviez pas faire moins de fracas ? C'était trop compliqué d'attendre à l'abri dans une cage que le rituel soit terminé ? » {n}Le bouffon lance un regard en arrière vers l'autel.{/n} « Tavrisk, ne restez pas là ! »

languages.text: "Aber wie seid Ihr ...? Der Aufzug! Verdammt, warum musstet Ihr so einen Aufruhr veranstalten? Warum konntet Ihr nicht einfach in einem Käfig sitzen, wo Ihr nicht stört, und abwarten, bis das Ritual abgeschlossen ist?" {n}Der Hofnarr blickt zurück zum Altar.{/n} "Tavrisk, Bewegung!"
languages.original_text: "But how did you... the elevator! Damn it, why did you have to make all this commotion? Why couldn't you just sit in a cage, out of the way, and wait for the ritual to be completed?" {n}The fool looks back at the altar.{/n} "Tavrisk, move!"

traits.locale_text: "Aber wie seid Ihr ...? Der Aufzug! Verdammt, warum musstet Ihr so einen Aufruhr veranstalten? Warum konntet Ihr nicht einfach in einem Käfig sitzen, wo Ihr nicht stört, und abwarten, bis das Ritual abgeschlossen ist?" {n}Der Hofnarr blickt zurück zum Altar.{/n} "Tavrisk, Bewegung!"
